meanings.definition: Consisting of or divided into four parts or members.
meanings.sent1: The tetramerous puzzle had four pieces that fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The team of four friends had a tetramerous plan to divide the tasks equally.
meanings.sent3: The tetramerous cupcakes were a hit at the party, each guest getting one of the four flavors.
meanings.sent4: The tetramerous building stood tall, with four identical towers reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The tetramerous flag proudly displayed four colors, representing unity and diversity.

meanings.definition: Having parts arranged in groups of four.
meanings.sent1: The tetramerous beads on the necklace created a pattern of four repeated colors.
meanings.sent2: The tetramerous chairs around the table allowed for comfortable seating for the family of four.
meanings.sent3: The tetramerous socks in the drawer always seemed to go missing in sets of four.
meanings.sent4: The tetramerous pattern on the wallpaper gave the room a sense of symmetry and balance.
meanings.sent5: The tetramerous design on the quilt showcased the skill of the quilter in arranging four shapes together.

meanings.definition: A flower with its parts in fours.
meanings.sent1: The garden displayed a beautiful tetramerous bloom, with four delicate petals in full bloom.
meanings.sent2: The florist arranged a bouquet with tetramerous flowers, each with four distinct petals.
meanings.sent3: The tetramerous blossom seemed to wink playfully in the breeze, showing off its four petals.
meanings.sent4: The tetramerous flower in the vase symbolized harmony, with its four petals representing balance.
meanings.sent5: The tetramerous bloom in the field stood out with its four vibrant petals, attracting bees and butterflies alike.
